sourcesContent:
import './index.css' import {Component} from 'react' class LettersCalculator extends Component { state = {searchInput: ''} countSearchInput = event => { const inputValue = event.target.value inputValue.filter(eachChar => eachChar !== '') this.setState({searchInput: inputValue}) } render() { const {searchInput} = this.state console.log(searchInput) return (

Calculate the Letters you enter

Enter the phrase

No. of letters: 10

) } } export default LettersCalculator
